IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE MISSOURI BAPTIST FOUNDATION STRENGTHENS MISSION & MINISTRY EFFORTS OF MO BAPTISTS BY PROVIDING RESOURCES AND SERVICES THAT SUPPORT CHURCHES, INSTITUTIONS, AND OTHER ENTITIES EXEMPT UNDER 501(C)(3).
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE MISSOURI BAPTIST FOUNDATION IS TO STRENGTHEN MISSION AND MINISTRY EFFORTS OF MISSOURI BAPTISTS.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION HAS FIDUCIARY RESPONSIBILITY FOR SAFEKEEPING, INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT, AND DISTRIBUTION OF FUNDS TO DONOR-DESIGNATED BAPTIST ORGANIZATIONS AND INDIVIDUALS (TRUST ADMINISTRATION AND ASSET MANAGEMENT).

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION CONDUCTS ESTATE STEWARDSHIP EDUCATION FOR MEMBERS OF BAPTIST CHURCHES AS WELL AS ESTATE AND GIFT PLANNING SERVICES PROVIDED TO CHURCH MEMBERS AND OTHERS MAKING PLANS TO BENEFIT THEIR CHURCH AND/OR VARIOUS BAPTIST MINISTRIES. THE PURPOSE OF THE MISSOURI BAPTIST FOUNDATION IS TO STRENGTHEN MISSION AND MINISTRY EFFORTS OF MISSOURI BAPTISTS WITHIN THE STATE AND AROUND THE WORLD BY PROVIDING RESOURCES AND SERVICES THAT SUPPORT, ADVANCE OR FURTHER THE RELIGIOUS AND/OR CHARITABLE PURPOSES OF CHURCHES, INSTITUTIONS, AND OTHER ENTITIES EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX BY SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES DIRECT SUPPORT TO CONSTITUENT ORGANIZATIONS BY CONTRIBUTING FUNDS TO SUPPORT THEIR MINISTRIES AND CHARITABLE PURPOSE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INTENDED USE OF THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS TO PROVIDE FOR PERPETUAL SUPPORT OF THE ONGOING MINISTRY AND OPERATIONS OF THE MISSOURI BAPTIST FOUNDATION.

PER NOTE 1 OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS: THE FOUNDATION IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501 OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND A SIMILAR PROVISION OF STATE LAW. HOWEVER, THE FOUNDATION IS SUBJECT TO FEDERAL INCOME TAX ON UNRELATED BUSINESS TAXABLE INCOME. THE FOUNDATION FILES TAX RETURNS IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION. BASED ON THE EVALUATION OF THE FOUNDATION'S TAX POSITIONS, MANAGEMENT BELIEVES ALL POSITIONS TAKEN WOULD BE UPHELD, THUS NO PROVISION FOR THE EFFECTS OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS HAVE BEEN RECORDED AT SEPTEMBER 30, 2018 AND 2017.

GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: RUSSIA AND NEIGHBORING STATES - ARMENIA, AZERBIJAN, BELARUS,
GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: BUILD / ADD TO CHILDREN'S HEALTHCARE CENTER IN "ZHEMCHUZHINKA" VILLAGE OF IMENIN KORBIN DISTRICT, BREST REGION, BELARUS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MISSOURI BAPTIST FOUNDATION (MBF) SENDS THE FUNDS VIA WIRE TRANSFER TO THE FOREIGN ORGANIZATION'S ACCOUNT IN BELARUS. MBF'S INTERIM PRESIDENT HAS BEEN TO BELARUS AND VISITED WITH THE ORGANIZATION TO MONITOR THEIR FACILITIES AND THE USE OF THE FUNDS. MBF ALSO COMMUNICATES WITH THE ORGANIZATION PERIODICALLY VIA SKYPE, RECEIVES ANNUAL FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, AND HAS ADDITIONAL SITE VISITS BY ORGANIZATIONS THAT MBF PARTNERS WITH (THE BAPTIST HOME).

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: ANNUAL INCOME DISTRIBUTION FOR THE BUILDING FUND

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MBF REVIEWS SUBMITTED GRANT APPLICATIONS AND DETERMINES THE NEED FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION, IF ANY, FROM THE APPLICANT. UPON RECEIPT OF REQUESTED INFORMATION AND COMPLETION OF INTERNAL RESEARCH, MBF REVIEWS THE APPLICATIONS AND EVALUATES IN LIGHT OF FUNDS AVAILABLE AND WHETHER PROPOSED GRANTS ARE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE GUIDING PRINCIPLES AND GUIDELINES FOR ALLOCATING DISCRETIONARY FUND DISTRIBUTIONS. IF AN APPLICANT IS APPROVED TO RECEIVE FUNDS BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, MBF STAFF COMMUNICATES THE GRANT REQUIREMENTS TO THE RECIPIENT AND VERIFIES WHETHER THE QUALIFICATIONS ARE MET. ONCE THE QUALIFICATIONS ARE MET, MBF ARRANGES PAYMENT TO THE RECIPIENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ON SEPTEMBER 20, 2016, THE MISSOURI SUPREME COURT LEFT UNDISTURBED A FINAL JUDGEMENT BY THE COURT OF APPEALS THAT RESTORED THE MISSOURI BAPTIST FOUNDATION'S (MBF) FORMER ARTICLES OF AGREEMENT GIVING THE MISSOURI BAPTIST CONVENTION (MBC) THE RIGHT TO APPROVE ALL CHARTER CHANGES AND THE RIGHT TO ELECT AND REMOVE THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF MBF, AMONG OTHER RIGHTS. THUS MBC IS A CONTROLLING ENTITY, AND THE MBF IS A CONTROLLED ENTITY, AS DEFINED ON SCHEDULE R INSTRUCTIONS FOR FORM 990. IN OCTOBER 2016, THE MBF GOVERNING DOCUMENTS WERE FORMALLY AMENDED AS REQUIRED BY THE COURTS, RESTORING A 75 YEAR OLD RELATIONSHIP WITH THE MISSOURI BAPTIST CONVENTION. THE AMENDED AND RESTATED MBF CHARTER DESIGNATES THE MISSOURI BAPTIST CONVENTION AS THE "SOLE MEMBER" OF THE CORPORATION, WITH THE RIGHT TO ELECT MBF TRUSTEES AND TO APPROVE MBF CHARTER CHANGES, AMONG OTHER RIGHTS. THESE AMENDMENTS WERE APPROVED BY THE CONVENTION AT ITS ANNUAL MEETING IN OCTOBER 2017. IN A COOPERATIVE TRANSITION, THE MBC-ELECTED BOARD OF TRUSTEES ASSUMED OFFICE AT THE BEGINNING OF THE 2017 FISCAL YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SEE PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1 EXPLANATION LISTED PREVIOUSLY ON SCHEDULE O.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SEE PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1 EXPLANATION LISTED PREVIOUSLY ON SCHEDULE O.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SEE PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1 EXPLANATION LISTED PREVIOUSLY ON SCHEDULE O.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SEE PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1 EXPLANATION LISTED PREVIOUSLY ON SCHEDULE O.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTING FIRM BASED ON THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT OF THE ORGANIZATION. A DRAFT OF FORM 990 IS INTERNALLY REVIEWED BY MANAGEMENT, AND THEN PRESENTED TO THE BOARD PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD CHAIR ANNUALLY COMMUNICATES THE REQUIREMENT OF BOARD MEMBERS BEING INDEPENDENT IN JUDGMENT AND DECISION-MAKING. OVERSIGHT IS MONITORED BY BOTH STAFF AND BOARD MEMBERS ON AN ONGOING BASIS AS PART OF REGULARLY SCHEDULED COMMITTEE MEETINGS AND FREQUENT REVIEW OF PREPARED MINUTES TO THOSE MEETINGS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO ENSURE TOP MANAGEMENT AND ALL STAFF SALARIES, INCLUDING OTHER OFFICERS' SALARIES ARE REASONABLE, THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD ESTABLISHES THE COMPENSATION USING AN EMPLOYEE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE. THE COMMITTEE USES COMPENSATION COMPARABILITY STUDIES, SALARY RANGES, AND OVERALL BUDGET MANAGEMENT CONSIDERATIONS TO ESTABLISH COMPENSATION. AFTER CAREFUL STUDY, THE COMMITTEE RECOMMENDS TO THE FULL BOARD THE ANNUAL SALARY FOR THE PRESIDENT AND OTHER STAFF SALARIES ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION UPON REQUEST, BUT GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE NOT.
THE AUDIT OVERSIGHT AND PROCESSES HAVE NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

EFFECTIVE OCTOBER 1, 2018, THE MISSOURI BAPTIST FOUNDATION (MBF) UPDATED ITS EXEMPT STATUS DETERMINATION TO ONCE AGAIN BE EXEMPTED FROM FILING FORM 990 DUE TO ITS RE-AFFILIATION WITH THE MISSOURI BAPTIST CONVENTION, A RELIGIOUS ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM FILING FORM 990 LISTED ON SCHEDULE R OF THIS 990. AS SUCH, THIS WILL BE THE FINAL 990 FOR MBF FOR THE FORESEEABLE FUTURE. MBF WILL CONTINUE TO FILE FORM 990-T EACH YEAR TO REPORT ANY UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME, AS REQUIRED.
